comment._content: This is fantastic. It's great to see film from one of our favorite Florida attractions. Thanks again for sharing these.

comment.author: 46153094@N02
comment._content: I am Amazed at this !!    I remember when i was young,(late 60's), going to this place, and watching this very gunfight !!  Too Cool !  Blast from the Past !
